::Annihilator/Killer::

Killer nods. "As you say, sir." He relays the orders to Annihilator over his comm-link, deactivating the autoguns.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Annihilator gets up. The shots had knocked him into a wall. He growls as Killer gives him the new orders.

"Maximals, we are from the Tripredacus Council," he says to Tigerhawk over his comm-link, "Here to arrest Hell Beast and bring the Maximals back. We are in a joint mission with the Maximal Elders, but only we possessed the transwarp technology."

He looks at the maximals, hoping they would hold their fire.
